title: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.
description:
Description: Any item can't be selected at the first time in library outline view.

Steps to reproduce:

1. Add a label in library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view.

Observed Behavior: When attempting to select the label item in the library outline view for the first time, the focus jumps to the library file node instead of selecting the label item.

Expected Behavior: When attempting to select the label item in the library outline view for the first time, the label item should be selected without the focus jumping to the library file node.

Steps to Reproduce:

1. Add a label in library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label item in the library outline view.
